howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Simple. Brilliant. Effective.
howItWorks.description: The Review Filter acts as a digital buffer that strategically filters negative reviews.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Customers scan the QR code or tap the NFC chip on your display.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Happy customers are directed to Google. Unhappy ones send feedback directly to you.
howItWorks.step3Desc: You only receive positive reviews on Google â€” plus valuable feedback to improve.

benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.title: Why Review Filter?
benefits.benefit1Desc: Our filter ensures only the best reviews appear on Google â€” automatically and reliably.
benefits.benefit2Desc: Scan a QR or tap NFC. No app, no login, zero friction for your customers.
benefits.benefit3Desc: Better reviews = more clicks = more customers. More effective and cheaper than any SEO campaign.

showcase.label: Showcase
showcase.title: See the Filter in Action

products.label: Products
products.title: Handcrafted. Smart. Effective.
products.description: Our displays feature QR codes and NFC chips for quick, frictionless reviews.
products.tableDisplayDesc: Elegant stand with QR code and integrated NFC chip. Perfect for restaurants, cafes and hotels.
products.nfcCardDesc: Compact card with NFC technology. Ideal for mobile use and personal handover.
products.wallDisplayDesc: Professional wall-mounted display. Optimal for waiting areas and entrance zones.

madeInGermany.label: Quality
madeInGermany.title: Handcrafted in Germany
madeInGermany.description: Every Review Filter display is manufactured in our workshop in Germany. Premium materials, precision craftsmanship and sustainable production.
madeInGermany.quality1Desc: Acrylic glass, brushed aluminum and durable NFC chips for years of use.
madeInGermany.quality2Desc: Each display is individually inspected and carefully made in Germany.
madeInGermany.quality3Desc: Robust construction for daily hospitality use. No disposable products.

testimonials.label: Testimonials
testimonials.title: What Our Partners Say
testimonials.t1Text: Since using Review Filter, we've improved our Google rating from 3.9 to 4.7. Guests love the simple system.
testimonials.t2Text: Finally no more unfair 1-star reviews! We now get feedback directly and can react immediately.
testimonials.t3Text: The display looks premium and fits perfectly with our interior. Our customers love scanning the code.

successStories.label: Success Stories
successStories.title: What Our Customers Say
successStories.story1: We raised our Google reviews from 4.3 to 4.8 in just a few weeks!

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.faq1Q: How exactly does the Review Filter work?
faq.faq1A: The customer scans the QR code or taps the NFC chip. On an intermediate page, they're asked about their satisfaction. Happy customers are directed to Google, unhappy ones can send you private feedback.
faq.faq2A: Yes, absolutely. We don't solicit fake reviews or manipulate existing ones. We simply offer a smart way for customers to share feedback â€” positive on Google, constructive directly to you.
faq.faq3Q: How quickly will I see results?
faq.faq3A: Most of our partners report noticeable improvement within the first 2-4 weeks. Depending on customer traffic, it can happen even faster.
faq.faq4Q: Do my customers need an app?
faq.faq4A: No! Just scan the QR code or tap the NFC chip â€” done. No app, no login, zero effort for your customers.
faq.faq5Q: Which industries is the Review Filter suitable for?
faq.faq5A: All industries with customer contact: restaurants, hotels, retail, medical practices, hair salons, auto repair shops, service providers and many more.
faq.faq6A: You receive the physical display (table, wall or card), the configured QR code and NFC chip, plus access to your feedback dashboard. No monthly fees.
